name: Felling Smash

sections.name: Prerequisites
sections.description: Int 13, Str 13, Combat Expertise, Improved Trip, Power Attack, base attack bonus +6.

sections.body: If you use the attack action to make a single melee attack at your highest base attack bonus while using Power Attack and you hit an opponent, you can spend a swift action to attempt a trip combat maneuver against that opponent.
sections.name: Benefits

description: You commit all your focus to a devastating blow, trying to crush your opponent to the ground.
